mapper.sql:
select bs_user_labtest_item_id, user_id, bs_labtest_items_id, remark, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by,delete_id,user_type
from bs_user_labtest_item
mapper.select: SELECT bs_labtest_items_id FROM bs_user_labtest_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_type = '2' AND delete_id = '0'

select ui.bs_user_labtest_item_id, ui.user_id, ui.bs_labtest_items_id, ui.remark, ui.delete_id, ui.create_time, ui.user_type, ui.create_by, ui.update_time, ui.update_by,u.nick_name,u.user_name,i.item_name,i.item_code from bs_user_labtest_item ui inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=ui.user_id inner join bs_labtest_items i on i.bs_labtest_items_id=ui.bs_labtest_items_id where ui.user_id = #{userId} and ui.delete_id = '0' and i.is_delete='0' and i.is_enable='1' and u.del_flag='0' and u.status='0' order by ui.create_time desc

select ui.bs_user_labtest_item_id, ui.user_id, ui.bs_labtest_items_id, ui.remark, ui.delete_id, ui.create_time,ui.user_type, ui.create_by, ui.update_time, ui.update_by,u.nick_name,u.user_name,i.item_name,i.item_code from bs_user_labtest_item ui inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=ui.user_id inner join bs_labtest_items i on i.bs_labtest_items_id=ui.bs_labtest_items_id where ui.bs_user_labtest_item_id = #{userLabtestItemId} and ui.delete_id = '0' and i.is_delete='0' and i.is_enable='1' and u.del_flag='0' and u.status='0' order by ui.create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into bs_user_labtest_item
bs_user_labtest_item_id, user_id, bs_labtest_items_id, remark, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, user_type,
#{userLabtestItemId}, #{userId}, #{labtestItemsId}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{userType},

insert into bs_user_labtest_item ( bs_user_labtest_item_id, user_id, bs_labtest_items_id, remark, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, user_type ) values
( #{item.userLabtestItemId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.labtestItemsId}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.userType} )
